titleStmt.title: An account of the wicked design of poysoning the Prince of Orange before he came out of Holland Also a relation from the city of Orange of a strange meteor, representing a crown of light, that was there seen in the air, May 6th, 1688. In a letter from a gentleman in Amsterdam, to his friend in London. Octob. 1. 1688.

An account of the wicked design of poysoning the Prince of Orange before he came out of Holland Also a relation from the city of Orange of a strange meteor, representing a crown of light, that was there seen in the air, May 6th, 1688. In a letter from a gentleman in Amsterdam, to his friend in London. Octob. 1. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; place of publication from Wing.
